name: Prowler 'PR-2' Gauntlets (unactive)
description: A form of PCE (proprietary cybernetic equipment), engineered by some of the more insane craftsmen of the Old Guard. Rigged specifically for the famous (or infamous) Snow-meow, these powered gauntlets attatch to the arms of any alloy-plated cyborg. When un-activated, they make a great shield but are heavy and unwieldy. Activate to power the unit and transform the weapon into its battery-powered bladed-form. A Personal UPS is recommended for operating this unit. [WARNING: It is not advised to utilize this equipment without the Prowler 'PR-2' Gauntlets Support Frame, read the operating manual for further instructions.] [Hydraulic Muscles recommended for use.]

use_action.msg: You hear a seering 'Shing!' as your Prowler PR-2 engages its blades.
